comment:
* A SeekBar is an extension of ProgressBar that adds a draggable thumb. The user can touch * the thumb and drag left or right to set the current progress level or use the arrow keys. * Placing focusable widgets to the left or right of a SeekBar is discouraged. *

* Clients of the SeekBar can attach a {@link SeekBar.OnSeekBarChangeListener} to * be notified of the user's actions. * * @attr ref android.R.styleable#SeekBar_thumb

methods.name: void onProgressRefresh(float scale, boolean fromUser, int progress)
public void setOnSeekBarChangeListener(OnSeekBarChangeListener l)
methods.comment:
* Sets a listener to receive notifications of changes to the SeekBar's progress level. Also
     * provides notifications of when the user starts and stops a touch gesture within the SeekBar.
     *
     * @param l The seek bar notification listener
     *
     * @see SeekBar.OnSeekBarChangeListener

methodNames: void onProgressRefresh(float scale, boolean fromUser, int progress)
